text: The 1999 Stanley Cup Finals was the championship series of the National Hockey League's (NHL) 1998â€“99 season, and the end of the 1999 Stanley Cup playoffs. It was played between the Eastern Conference champion Buffalo Sabres and the Western Conference champion Dallas Stars. It was the 106th year of the Stanley Cup being played for. Category:Stanley Cup Finals Category:Ice hockey in the United States Category:Dallas Stars
title: 1999 Stanley Cup Finals
